Sentencas: The structural integrity of the sealant is crucial for a reliable operation of solid oxide fuel cell stacks and systems.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this respect, fracture properties and elevated temperature deformation are aspects which need to be assessed, particularly for partially crystallized glass-ceramic sealants that might suffer from instability issues at operation relevant temperatures due to viscoelastic deformation of the residual glass phase.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Bending tests are carried out at room temperature and typical stack operation temperatures (700 and 800 degrees C) on an Ag reinforced sealant in a head-to-head specimen geometry in the as-sintered and annealed state, yielding average fracture stresses and creep data.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results reveal a decrease of the fracture stress at elevated temperatures, where this effect appears to be less pronounced for the annealed material.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Complementary microstructural analyses aid the understanding of the mechanical behavior and in particular the influence of silver particles.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Creep tests reveal a remarkably stronger creep resistance of this material compared to a YSZ reinforced glass-ceramic sealant variation.
Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Mechanical behavior of silver reinforced glass-ceramic sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
